Posts.EditableText:
I'm looking to gather up a team of VB coders, and knowledge in DirectX is also required.  I've pushed myself further and further into the gaming business and i now have a 3D game done purely in VB.  The game is called Silver Moon Online and i will be needing some help from this point onwards.

[img:10jvge8l]http://www.squiggleuk.com/smoss.jpg[/img:10jvge8l]

DirectX has already been put in, and alot of system are in there too, but i will need people to help advance the game, add new features etc.

Posts.EditableText: Why not go to some big site where alot of VB coders hang out? I don't think those who know VB here would be very willing to help.
